message: I propose dividing the $1,000,000 with a 65/35 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more considering the decreasing value of money. This 4:1 split is a fair compromise.
Considering the decreasing value of money, I propose a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This aims to ensure a fair division while taking into account the inflation rate.

I'm willing to compromise further, but I think 3:2 is a more reasonable split considering the current value of money. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not willing to give up too much more.
